patterns.name: textual-app-widget-hierarchy
patterns.description: TextualReplApp widget structure: Header > ResourceBar > Vertical#body(RichLog, Static#streaming-output, Editor) > Footer

patterns.name: message-driven-architecture
patterns.description: 4 custom messages: EditorCompletionsAvailable, EditorSubmitRequested, ShowToolConfirmationModal, ToolConfirmationResult

patterns.name: future-based-tool-confirmation
patterns.description: Tool confirmation uses asyncio.Future pattern - request_tool_confirmation() creates Future, modal resolves it via ToolConfirmationResult message

patterns.name: streaming-buffer-pattern
patterns.description: Streaming pause/resume uses _streaming_paused flag and _stream_buffer list, flush on resume

patterns.name: tunacode-theme
patterns.description: Custom theme built from UI_COLORS in constants.py, registered as 'tunacode' in on_mount(), uses external textual_repl.tcss

patterns.name: textual-input-bar-sizing
patterns.description: Sizing guidance for the Textual input row
